syrto.title: Syrto
syrto.description: SyrtoÂ® is an advanced platform for identifying business opportunities, managing risks, and predicting the performance of clients and suppliers. It integrates neural networks and machine learning with financial expertise, offering a comprehensive solution for decision-making.

travelMap.title: Travel Map
travelMap.description: Travel Map is a web app designed to track and relive my travels. It allows users to visualize all visited destinations on an interactive map and explore a collection of photos and videos for each place.

tennisdle.title: Tennisdle
tennisdle.description: Tennisdle is a web app where players must guess the daily ATP or WTA tennis player based on hints such as age, height, titles won (Grand Slams, Olympics, Finals), and playing style (dominant hand and backhand type).

linktree.title: Linktree
linktree.description: Linktree is a web app designed to showcase all my links in one place. It is the website you are currently visiting.

header.description: Full Stack Developer and Machine Learning Consultant
